challengeName: [serenity] NodeJS ScorecardId should not be required
detailedRequirements:
Currently the endpoint to create scorecard items on the challenge service at http://lc1-challenge-service.herokuapp.com/challenges/4/scorecards/2/scorecardItems (POST) required the scorecardID in the POST.  Since the scorecardId is already in the URL that should be used.  If a scorecardID is sent in the POST and it's different then the URL then the API should return an error.

Please update NodeJS app at https://github.com/appirio-tech/lc1-challenge-service.

Requirements

  • Update swagger file so scordeardID is not required on POST.
  • The API should not allow a different scorcardId in the URl and POST body.
  • Create tests validating both above scenarios.

Possible bonus!!

There are several other endpoint which follow this same pattern where the id is in the url and the body.  This is in POST and PUTs.  For every endpoint you update and test you create for that endpoint you can get $25. 

The criteria for being eligible for the bonus include:

  • Required field removed from POST/PUT
  • Validation done on the POST/PUT to make sure URL and body are not different if parameter exists in the body.
  • Test for field not being required and that the API returns an error if URL and body parameters are different.

OR

If you can update the swagger file where no controller code requirements are needed, you can get $300.  I'm not 100% sure this is possible.  I've looked into using allOf to override elements of a Resource.  This will require a major refractor of the swagger file where you would have a BaseResource which could be overridden.
